#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#define Mod 8388608
using namespace std;

long long int ans;
int a[4],n;

int pow(){
    if(n == 1) return 1;
    int p = n-1;
    int x = 2;
    int r = 1;
    while(p != 1){
        if(p&1){
            r = (r * x) % Mod;
        }
        p = p >> 1;
        x = (x * x) % Mod;
    }
    r = (r * x) % Mod;
    return r;
}

void solve(){
    ans = n*n - n + 2;
    ans = ans % Mod;
    ans *= pow();
    ans = ans % Mod;
    ans -= 1;
    if(ans < 0) ans += Mod;
}
int main(){
    int T;
    scanf("%d", &T);

    while(T--){
        scanf("%d", &n);
        solve();
        printf("%lld\n", ans);
    }
}
